##  a.k.a Reproducible science

In ```terminal```
```{bash, echo=T, eval=F}
cd ~/Downloads # or wherever
git clone  https://github.com/msandifo/reprosci.git
```

#### 2018/reprosci001

in ```terminal```
```{bash, echo=T, eval=F}
cd ~/Downloads/reprosci/2018/reprosci001 # or wherever n
rm -r .drake 
open reprosci001.Rproj 
```
In ```rstudio console```
```{r, echo=T, eval=F}
source("drake001.R")
```
for code explanation see  https://github.com/msandifo/reprosci/tree/master/2018/reprosci001
